com.opengamma.strata.calc.marketdata

Interface SingleCalculationMarketData

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultSingleCalculationMarketData

    public interface SingleCalculationMarketData
    A source of market data provided to an engine function and used for a calculation across a single scenario.

    The set of data provided by this interface is a subset of the set provided by CalculationMarketDataMap. For example a function might request a USD discounting curve, but the scenario market data can contain multiple curve groups, each with a USD discounting curve.

    Typically a set of MarketDataRules are used to choose the item of market data from the global set.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • getValuationDate

        LocalDate getValuationDate()
        Gets the valuation date of the market data.

        All values accessible through this interface have the same valuation date.

        Returns:
        the valuation dates of the calculation

      • getValue

        <T> T getValue(MarketDataKey<T> key)
        Returns the market data value identified by the specified key.

        The result will be a single piece of market data valid for the valuation date. The value will be for the scenario that this object represents.

        Type Parameters:
        T - type of the market data
        Parameters:
        key - key identifying the market data
        Returns:
        the market data value
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if the value cannot be returned

      • getTimeSeries

        LocalDateDoubleTimeSeries getTimeSeries(ObservableKey key)
        Returns the time series identified by the specified key.
        Parameters:
        key - key identifying the market data
        Returns:
        the time series
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if the time-series cannot be returned
